meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1090.

td.p: Michael Koenig, a writer from New York City, New York
Phil Bergen, a librarian from Needham, Massachusetts
Bill Schuler, a systems administrator from San Francisco, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,401)

tr.td: ZOOLOGY
DISC JOCKEYS
RELIGION
HOLLYWOOD
POTENT POTABLES
"BAR"S
